titles.title: Encouraging Americans to purchase American-made products during the holiday season, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 11/15/2007--Introduced. Recognizes that the United States has the safest regulatory regime in the world that better protects families and children. Encourages Americans to support American workers and protect American children by buying American products this holiday season.
